deviceDetails.name: Laptop
deviceDetails.description: A laptop is a portable personal computer designed for mobile use. They are fitted with a keyboard, display screen, and pointing evice (such as a touchpad or pointing stick), with a battery provided to power the device. Laptops are highly portable, allowing users to work in a variety of locations, including at home, in the office, or outdoors.

deviceDetails.name: Phone
deviceDetails.description: A phone is a portable communication device that allows users to make and receive calls and send and receive text messages. They are also used for accessing the internet, playing games, and taking photos.
